name: Facility 137
description:
Escape the Facility, Run for the Exit! But be careful, you are not alone. 

  • WASD
  • Mouse
  • Space
  • E
  • (press F to toggle your flashlight, this does not affect the enemy AI)

The enemy AI is looking for you, make sure he doesn't see you, and be careful with any sound you make!

When in doubt, follow the lamps.

This game was made for JamDNA4. 

  •  Criteria #1 Nighttime: The game is set during the night.
  •  Criteria #2 Eerie: The game is set in an eerie facility, where things have gone a bit wrong.
  • Criteria #3  Ambient Piano: The soundtrack is mainly piano.
  • Criteria #4 Vibrant: The enemy Ai's eye pulsates, and the lights flicker.
